mapper.update: Update Works set organization = #{organization} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM WorkPlan WHERE id = #{id} AND DATE(work_days) = CURDATE();
mapper.update: UPDATE Works SET work_late = work_late + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND TIME(CONVERT_TZ(now(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul')) > '09:00:00';
UPDATE Works SET work_early = work_early + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND TIME(CONVERT_TZ(now(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul')) < '18:00:00';
update Works set all_workday = all_workday + 1 where id = #{id}

UPDATE Works SET all_worktime = all_worktime + TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute, (SELECT MIN(wt.work_time) FROM WorkTimes wt WHERE wt.id = #{id} AND DATE(wt.work_time) = CURDATE() AND wt.work_type = '근무중'), (SELECT MIN(wt.work_time) FROM WorkTimes wt WHERE wt.id = #{id} AND DATE(wt.work_time) = CURDATE() AND wt.work_type = '근무 종료')) WHERE id = #{id} AND DATE((SELECT MIN(wt.work_time) FROM WorkTimes wt WHERE wt.id = #{id} AND DATE(wt.work_time) = CURDATE() AND wt.work_type = '근무중')) = CURDATE();

UPDATE Works w SET work_notcheck = ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT id FROM WorkTimes GROUP BY id, work_time HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN work_type = '근무중' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN work_type = '근무 종료' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 ) wt ) WHERE id=#{id};
